then.line: Okay, Prota, let's see what you brought me!
Here you go!
Uh.... this is a tin can.
That's right! A tin CAN be a robot's head, if you use it right! ...Right?
You know what, Prota, I like your ingenuity. Reminds me of a young me.
I'll see what magic I can work with this.
In the mean time, you should get back out there and see what you can find for the torso.
I'm on it, Randi!
What did you find out there, Prota?
You'll see! Or should I say... you'll C?
I think that's what you said the first time!
Not quite! You'll LETTER C, this LCD screen I found! Almost as good as new.
Wow! I didn't even know that was out there! It looks great!
If I can work some of my programming magic on it, we could turn this into a robot head no problem.
Perfect! Wow, thanks Randi. I never would have thought to do this.
No problem, Prota. It's part of being in a community. We help each other out.
Now, you should head back out there and see if we can't find this thing a body!
I'm on it!
Back already? What'd you find?
I think I found the perfect head to sniff out Minty's location!
Here you go!
....You don't think it looks a little...familar, do you?
Familiar? What do you mean?
Oh, it's probably nothin'! Let's keep on building this thing, shall we?
What you need next is a torso for this thing! Make it a good one!
I'm on it!
